code:
MOD = 10**9 + 7
s = input().strip()
n = len(s)
pow10 = [1] * (n + 1)
for i in range(1, n + 1):
    pow10[i] = (pow10[i - 1] * 10) % MOD

prefix = [0] * (n + 1)
for i in range(n):
    prefix[i + 1] = (prefix[i] * 10 + int(s[i])) % MOD

total = 0
for i in range(n):
    for j in range(i + 1, n + 1):
        left = prefix[i]
        right = (prefix[n] - prefix[j] * pow10[n - j]) % MOD
        if right < 0:
            right += MOD
        val = (left * pow10[n - j] + right) % MOD
        total = (total + val) % MOD

print(total)
